Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: PRO B760M-P DDR4


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Supports 12th / 13th Gen Intel Core Processors, Pentium Gold and Celeron Processors


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel B760


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: DDR4 3200
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express 4.0 x16
PCI Express x16: 1 x PCI Express x16
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCI Express x1


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: 2 x M.2
M.2_1 Source (From CPU) supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4 , supports 2280/2260/2242 devices
M.2_2 Source (From Chipset) supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4 / SATA mode, supports 2280/2260/2242 devices

* SATA5 will be unavailable when installing M.2 SATA SSD in the M2_2 slot.


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC897
Audio Channels: 8 Channels


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x D-Sub / 1 x DisplayPort / 1 x HDMI / 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C / 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C / 4 x USB 2.0/1.1


Physical Spec
Form Factor: Micro ATX
Label: Board MSI Pro B760M-P DDR4
